paper_title: Eigenvalues, singular values, and the O'Shea-Sjamaar Theorem
abstract: The main focus of this work is the study of several cones relating the eigenvalues or singular values of a matrix to those of its off-diagonal blocks. Some of these cones were studied by Fomin-Fulton-Li-Poon twenty years ago, but we will explain why their description is incomplete and how we can remedy it using the O'Shea-Sjamaar theorem.
publication_venue: This work is an extended version of the pre-publication arXiv:2208.13531, the latter not being intended for publication
